Vienna Nights
Royal Conservatory of Brussels, Brussels, Brussels-Capital, Belgium Buizingen came second and joins Willebroek on the 2008 Stavanger Europeans.
Since 2007, the Championship Division bands only played a set work and no own choice.
Oct. 6, 2009, 11:04 p.m. Oct. 21, 2015, 4:46 p.m.
